price: Allah said, “Certainly not! Go, both of you, with Our signs[5]; We are with you, listening.
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ
footnotes: [5] i.e., the miracles of the staff and the shining hand, given to Moses.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
